descriptionHtml:
The Ebony Mail was the top armor to have in Morrowind.  Best armor rating and one of the best enchantments.  Skyrim\\\'s version, after missing this armor in Oblivion, was a big let down.

But, not really difficult to change so I\\\'m surprised it hasn\\\'t been done.

The armor is improved to be just about 10% better than daedric (like Morrowind\\\'s)

The enchant has also been changed:

Fire resist 75%
Fortify armor 50%
Magic resist 20%

For one of the last daedric quests that you have to give up one of your companions permanently for, my thought was that Morrowind\\\'s stats were far more fitting as a reward for that loss.  Enjoy.
author: brpratts
